activity.title: Drag and drop multiple
activity.instructions: Drag the correct word(s) into each sentence.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: <blank word="There are"/> some carrots in the microwave.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: <blank word="There’s"/> olive oil for your bread.

question.text: <blank word="Is there "/> an onion on the shelf?

question.text: <blank word="There are"/> apples and oranges in the salad.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: I’m in the mood for a sandwich. <blank word="Is there"/> any bread?

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: Let’s eat something healthy. <blank word="Are there"/> any vegetables?

question.text: <blank word="There isn’t"/> enough salt in this soup.
